item.title: CTF: Huntress CTF
item.author: Hato0
item.description: Huntress Writeup Each challenges successfully solved will be explained here. The solution will not only be put in writing but also the way of thinking and failed tries will be described. Unfortunately, took too long to write it (didn’t took note …) so wasn’t able to re-do all the challenges before the server shutdown. Read The Rules This challenge is pretty straight forward. Read the rules using the view-source utility and you will find a commented html line with the flag.
